text: Rakim Athelaston Mayers (born October 3, 1988), better known by his stage name ASAP Rocky (stylized as A$AP Rocky; , ), is an American rapper. In August 2011, his single "Peso" was leaked online and made him popular. His popular mixtape Live. Love. A$AP debuted at number 1 on the Billboard 200 in 2013. It earned him a BET Award nomination for Best Male Hip-Hop Artist. He is a member of the hip hop collective ASAP Mob. == Personal life == In May 2021, Mayers revealed during an interview with GQ that he was dating Barbadian pop singer Rihanna since 2020. The two appeared in his 2013 music video, "Fashion Killa" on his debut album "LONG.LIVE.A$AP". They have two sons together, RZA (born 2022) and Riot Rose (born 2023). ==Discography== Studio albums *Long. Live. ASAP (2013) *At. Long. Last.
